meanings.definition: Make practical and effective use of.
meanings.sent1: She utilized her time wisely by studying for the exam.
meanings.sent2: The company utilized the new technology to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: He utilized his umbrella as a makeshift shield from the unexpected rain.
meanings.sent4: The teacher utilized storytelling to make the lesson more engaging.
meanings.sent5: The chef utilized fresh ingredients to create a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: Put to use; turn to profitable account or use.

meanings.sent2: The business owner utilized social media to promote her products.
meanings.sent3: The magician utilized his skills to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: The athlete utilized his speed to win the race.
